thread.section_title: Hotel Anglo Americano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Hotel Anglo Americano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Christy N
title: Great Location
text: This hotel is located near Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps and walking distance to a lot of Rome tourist sites. The hotel is fairly plain and traditional in its decor. The breakfast area is nice and clean but the selection of foods is limited compared to what I heard about other hotels in the area. The view from my room was beautiful.
